jparsec.math

Class Converter

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.math.Converter

  • public class Converter
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to perform unit conversions.

    A simple example is:

     try {
                Converter c = new Converter("pc", "AU");
                double val = c.convert(10);
                System.out.println(val);
                System.out.println("Correct value: " + (10 * Constant.PARSEC / (1000.0 * Constant.AU)));
 } catch (JPARSECException e)
 {
                e.showException();
 }
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)
